TopicTitle: Things to really flush out KSP (I could have some good Ideas)

Articles.Content:
These are things that I thing could really flush out KSP and make it so much more.

I know allot of these thing are would not happen fast but over a year it could happen.

Personally I love this game and currently have 100+ hours and counting. Best money ive spent on a game in a long time.

Content:

  • Integrate the best modes. Mods like the entire Umbra Space Industries, B9, KW Rocketry, Kerbal attachment system, and remote tech need to be core thing that should come with the base game
  • The ability to move around inside of buildings and stations we build. Let us spend some time in the thing we spend hours building and launching..
  • Better FX's even if its a clickable option. Thins such as clouds, forests, roads, towns. Things to make Kerbin seem like more than a hunk of green rock with a space station.

Game Features:

  • More categories/ sub categories and a favorites list of parts.
  • More Options Such as a checkbox in the settings that uses eather the mods or a system similar. EX: Remote Tech, Tac Life, Deadly Rentry, Ferram Aerospace
  • Built in multiplayer support with the option of running a carrier mode with your friends where you all earn money and science and put it into a pool and the the admin or player elected president chooses missions and new tech upgrades. Also the ability to use custom tech trees. Currently with darkmultiplayer the game lags to hell if anyone is near you and its not in real time so battles with BD armory are trash at best. Fully synced multiplier is a must for KSP
  • Steam workshop support. I am tired of having to sift thro pages of mods on sites and fourms and then haft to track updates. Allow steam workshop support and let my game auto update please.
  • A node alarm clock similar to kerbal alarm clock built in.

Built in Editors:

  • Built in Tech Tree editor with a dedicated GUI that shows each item. Click and drag into the new nodes you want for any stile of tech tree.
  • Custom Flag builder built rite into the game. Its amazing to see what people can make with a few shapes and emblems.
  • Planet and Solar System builder. At worst let us check some boxes and generate a new planet and system. At best let us sculpt and build a planet and or solar system and place it where we choose.

First off, welcome to the forums!

I'd like to point out that several of your suggestions are listed on our What Not to Suggest list, namely (I've inserted the specific items on the list they map to in parentheses in the quote):

Content:

  • Integrate the best modes. Mods like the entire Umbra Space Industries, B9, KW Rocketry, Kerbal attachment system, and remote tech need to be core thing that should come with the base game (Robotics / mechanics; generic "New parts" suggestions; More functionality for satellites)
  • The ability to move around inside of buildings and stations we build. Let us spend some time in the thing we spend hours building and launching. (Enhanced IVA / moving around in stations or rockets)
  • Better FX's even if its a clickable option. Thins such as clouds, forests, roads, towns. Things to make Kerbin seem like more than a hunk of green rock with a space station. (Cities and landmarks; Weather features)

Game Features:

  • More categories/ sub categories and a favorites list of parts. (Rearranging the parts list)
  • More Options Such as a checkbox in the settings that uses eather the mods or a system similar. EX: Remote Tech, Tac Life, Deadly Rentry, Ferram Aerospace (Reentry heat; Realistic aerodynamics; Life Support; More functionality for satellites)
  • Built in multiplayer support with the option of running a carrier mode with your friends where you all earn money and science and put it into a pool and the the admin or player elected president chooses missions and new tech upgrades. Also the ability to use custom tech trees. Currently with darkmultiplayer the game lags to hell if anyone is near you and its not in real time so battles with BD armory are trash at best. Fully synced multiplier is a must for KSP (Multiplayer; Alternative Tech Tree configurations)
  • Steam workshop support. I am tired of having to sift thro pages of mods on sites and fourms and then haft to track updates. Allow steam workshop support and let my game auto update please. (Steam Workshop implementation)

Built in Editors:

  • Built in Tech Tree editor with a dedicated GUI that shows each item. Click and drag into the new nodes you want for any stile of tech tree. (Alternative Tech Tree configurations)
  • Planet and Solar System builder. At worst let us check some boxes and generate a new planet and system. At best let us sculpt and build a planet and or solar system and place it where we choose. (New stars, planets, moons and asteroids)

We don't mean to say that these aren't features that have been rejected by the developers or that aren't worthy of discussion; they've just been brought up so much in the past that most of what can be said about them, either for against them, has already been hashed out time and time again through the years, and thus we feel that we should keep the floor open for other ideas.

Since so many suggestions on your list are on the WNTS list, though, you would probably be better served by resubmitting the remaining suggestions individually, one per thread, in detail. Again, just a friendly suggestion, but it's one that's meant to ensure things go smoothly for all parties involved, as it ensures that each suggestion is discussed on its own merits. As such, I'll be closing this thread.

Have a good evening
